titleStmt.title: A declaration of the lordes and states of the realme of Hungarie contayning the reasons which mooued them in forcible manner to oppose themselues against the violence and oppression vsed and practised vpon the inhabitants of the foresaid countrey by the emperours subiects. Translated out of French.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ar. Hatfield for Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A declaration of the lordes and states of the realme of Hungarie.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
